summary.span: 提供 类的文件系统实现。

span.span: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现 `abstract` 基类以返回类的文件系统资源 。The class implements the `abstract` base class to return file system resources for the class. 客户端应用程序不会 直接创建实例; 而是通过 对实例调用方法来创建 。Client applications do not create instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the method on a instance. 方法返回一个 实例，该实例提供对文件系统资源的只读访问。The method returns a instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource. 类依赖于 类来实现错误处理和代码访问安全性。The class relies on the class for error handling and code access security.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

span.span: Closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除使用的资源 ，并通过调用方法关闭响应流 。The method cleans up the resources used by a and closes the response stream by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 必须关闭响应流以避免系统资源不足。The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. 可以通过调用或来关闭响应流 You can closes the response stream by calling either or ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法关闭响应流。The following example uses the method to close the response stream. summary.span: 获取文件系统资源中的内容长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.

value.span: 文件系统资源返回的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含文件系统资源的长度（以字节为单位）。The property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性获取文件系统资源的内容长度。The following example uses the property to obtain the content length of the file system resource. summary.span: 获取文件系统资源的内容类型。

span.span: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
The value "binary/octet-stream".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含文件系统资源的内容类型。The property contains the content type of the file system resource. 的值 始终为 "二进制/八进制流"。The value of is always "binary/octet-stream". ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性获取文件系统资源的内容类型。The following example uses the property to obtain the content type of the file system resource. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完后，调用 Dispose () 。Call Dispose() when you are finished using the . Dispose () 方法会使 处于不可用状态。The Dispose() method leaves the in an unusable state. () 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对的所有引用， 这样垃圾回收器才能收回占用的内存 。After calling Dispose(), you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 在释放对的最后一个引用之前，请始终调用 Dispose () 。Always call Dispose() before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
